body.name: NUMENN Bookshelf, 5 Tier Bookshelves, Home Office Bookcase Shelf Storage Organizer, Free Standing Storage Shelving Unit for Bedroom, Living Room and Home Office, Vintage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 52 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【5-TIER OPEN MULTIFUNCTIONAL BOOKSHELF】This 5 shelf bookshelf provides a very wide storage space, you can use it to place all kinds of items as you see fit. Books, photo albums, crafts, potted plants and etc. Beautiful bookshelf panel with waterproof and anti-scratch features, very easy to clean. Overall size: 23.6 * 11.8 * 60.6 inches (L * D * H)

【HIGH-QUALITY METAL FRAME& WOODEN BAFFLE】Constructed by premium metal and selected particle board, the contemporary metal bookcase is solid, stable, sturdy, and durable. With top notch anti-rust coating, the whole shelf looks more sophisticated. With an excellent metal frame and thick solid panel, each panel of the bookcase can hold up to 30 lbs. The back of the bookshelf is connected by wooden baffle, which is more beautiful and prevent small things from falling.

【ELEGANT MODERN STYLE & SUPER HIGH-QUALITY BOOKCASE】This home bookshelf perfectly combines the hard steel with the relic particle board, simple, sturdy, and functional. You can put it in your living room, study room, bedroom, and office. Choose Numenn Bookcase, make your space neat, tidy, and also in great style.

【FALL PREVENTING KIT & EASY ASSEMBLY】 Only 7 steps are required for this office shelf installation. Detailed instruction and tools for installing are all included. Please remember to install the anti-tilting tool on the wall for better stability and less unexpected injuries.

【SMILEY CUSTOMER SERVICE】Welcome to Contact Us! Your satisfaction is our first priority – We got you anytime for any issue regarding our product quality or any problem during your purchase. Easy and fast response and replacement is guaranteed.

Color: Vintage Material: Metal & Particle board Shelf Size: 23.6"L x 11.8"W x 60.6"H Maximum load capacity of each layer: 30 pounds Scenes: Home, bedroom, company, and living room, etc.

Fall Preventing Kit Installing the Fall Preventing Kit can prevent the bookshelf from falling, therefore protect your safety. Stable Connection The installation is simple, easy to disassemble, and very firm after assembly. Adjustable Feet The footpads could be slightly adjusted so that the storage shelf could stand stable even if the floor is not that even. Falling Prevention Baffle Five back baffle, which can prevent small objects from falling and make the bookshelf more secure and stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is very nice. Easy to put together and looks nice. I feel it was a good value. You can use this in any room to add more shelving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple, yet beautiful shelves! No complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought two for our guest room/reading room. They were easy enough to put together and look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the shelf. It was easy to put together (thank goodness) and it’s actually very sturdy. The backs on each shelf is sooo handy so things don’t fall off too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good quality, affordable shelf
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice affordable shelf. I was able to assemble it in 30 minutes by myself. You need to read the instructions as there is a specific way to put the metal bars together. It is a good quality shelf and exceeded my expectations for this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: decent quality relatively easy to assemble, but pay attention to the instructions or you'll be unscrewing pieces to redo, but even that is easy. For once, Amazon even delivered to the correct address 😀👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice looking bookcase. However, most of the shelves are scratched up. I would add photos, but the app appears to be acting up. If it wasn’t for the scratches all over, I’d say it was worth the money. I’m just annoyed buying something brand new and it’s not in better condition. Cute bookshelf, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my office space but decided to use in my kitchen instead and looks beautiful. Was pretty easy to put together too
